alert.note: Alert for Bottineau; McHenry; Rolette (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 23 at 2:40PM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Willow Creek near Willow City affecting McHenry, Rolette and Bottineau Counties. Souris River near Westhope affecting Bottineau County. .Snow melt and recent rainfall is making its way through the Souris River system and is expected to produce minor flooding in the Westhope area. Meanwhile, recent rainfall is making its way through the Willow Creek drainage system and is expected to produce minor flooding, mainly near Willow City. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Willow Creek near Willow City. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1442.0 feet, high water will create more nuisance type flooding over lowland areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 1441.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain near to just above flood stage for the foreseeable future. - Flood stage is 1442.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
